tool_description: Classifies genealogy documents into specific types based on content analysis and layout patterns to apply appropriate metadata extraction rules.

image_path.description: Path to document image for layout analysis

allowed_types.description: Restrict classification to specific document types

historical_period.description: Expected time period: pre1900, early1900s, mid1900s, modern, unknown

error_messages: Empty document text: Provide OCR extracted text for classification.
Invalid confidence threshold: Value must be between 0 and 100.
Image file not found: If providing image_path, ensure file exists.
Unsupported document type: Check allowed_types array for valid options.
Classification failed: Document may not match known genealogy record patterns.
Invalid historical period: Use one of [pre1900, early1900s, mid1900s, modern, unknown].
usage: Provide OCR document_text, optionally include image_path for layout analysis, set classification_confidence based on accuracy needs, restrict to specific document types with allowed_types if needed.

document_type.description: Classified document type (birth certificate, death certificate, marriage certificate, census record, etc.)

alternative_types.description: Other possible document types with lower confidence

key_indicators.description: Text patterns or layout features that influenced classification

metadata_schema.description: Recommended metadata extraction template for this document type
